trans-unit.source: Reads a forward-only stream of rows from a data source.
trans-unit.target: Leser en radsett bare strøm med rader fra en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: Combines the functionality of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> class and the <xref:System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord> interface.
trans-unit.target: Kombinerer funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>klassen og <xref:System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord>grensesnitt.</xref:System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: An EntityDataReader has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: En EntityDataReader har ingen offentlig konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: It can only be obtained through one of the `EntityCommand.ExecuteReader` method overloads.
trans-unit.target: Kan bare hentes gjennom en av de `EntityCommand.ExecuteReader` metoden overbelastninger.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] puts output parameters from stored procedures at the end of the result stream, after all the result sets.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]Plasserer utdata parametere fra lagrede prosedyrer på slutten av resultatdataflyten, etter at alle resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to get output parameter values, an application must consume all the records in all the result sets.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger utdata parameterverdier, må en applikasjon derfor bruke alle oppføringene i alle resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: If the application closes the EntityDataReader (which would also close the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>), output parameters might not be populated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet lukkes EntityDataReader (som også vil lukke den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>), kan ikke fylles ut utdataparametere.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: EntityDataReader does not implicitly consume result sets to make output parameters available.
trans-unit.target: EntityDataReader bruker ikke resultatsett foreta utdataparametere tilgjengelig implisitt.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, note the following: - EntityDataReader calls the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> only when <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Merk derfor følgende:-EntityDataReader kaller den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>bare når <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eksplisitt kalles.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> throws an exeption, [EntityDataReader](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) will wrap it in <xref:System.Data.EntityException> (or a derived exception).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>oppstår en exeption [EntityDataReader](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) omslutte den i <xref:System.Data.EntityException>(eller et avledet unntak).</xref:System.Data.EntityException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close%2A> only closes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, without consuming any pending records or result sets.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close%2A>bare lukker den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, uten bruke ventende poster eller resultatsett.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Dispose%2A> only disposes of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, without consuming any pending records or result sets.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Dispose%2A>bare disposes av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, uten bruke ventende poster eller resultatsett.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).
trans-unit.target: Koden eksempler [arbeide med EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] puts output parameters from stored procedures at the end of the result stream, after all the result sets.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]Plasserer utdata parametere fra lagrede prosedyrer på slutten av resultatdataflyten, etter at alle resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to get output parameter values, an application must consume all the records in all the result sets.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger utdata parameterverdier, må en applikasjon derfor bruke alle oppføringene i alle resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: If the application closes the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> (which would also close the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>), output parameters might not be populated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet lukkes den <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>(som også vil lukke den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>), kan ikke fylles ut utdataparametere.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> does not implicitly consume result sets to make output parameters available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>implisitt bruker ikke resultatsett foreta utdataparametere tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, note the following: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> calls the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> only when <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Merk derfor følgende:- <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>kall av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>bare når <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eksplisitt kalles.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> throws an exception, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> will wrap it in <xref:System.Data.EntityException> (or a derived exception).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>oppstår det et unntak <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>omslutte den i <xref:System.Data.EntityException>(eller et avledet unntak).</xref:System.Data.EntityException> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Close only closes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, without consuming any pending records or result sets.
trans-unit.target: -Lukker bare lukking av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, uten bruke ventende poster eller resultatsett.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Dispose%2A> only disposes of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, without consuming any pending records or result sets.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Dispose%2A>bare disposes av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, uten bruke ventende poster eller resultatsett.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataRecordInfo"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataRecordInfo"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The information of a data record.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen i et datapost.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir dybden på nesting for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: The outermost table has a depth of zero.
trans-unit.target: Den ytterste tabellen har dybden null.

trans-unit.source: The depth of nesting for the current row.
trans-unit.target: Dybde for nesting for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources consumed by this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> and calls <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close*>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressurser som brukes av dette <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> og samtaler <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close*>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close*>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] puts output parameters from stored procedures at the end of the result stream, after all the result sets.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]Plasserer utdata parametere fra lagrede prosedyrer på slutten av resultatdataflyten, etter at alle resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to get output parameter values, an application must consume all the records in all the result sets.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger utdata parameterverdier, må en applikasjon derfor bruke alle oppføringene i alle resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: If the application closes the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> (which would also close the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>), output parameters might not be populated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet lukkes den <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>(som også vil lukke den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>), kan ikke fylles ut utdataparametere.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>

trans-unit.source: [EntityDataReader](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) does not implicitly consume result sets to make output parameters available.
trans-unit.target: [EntityDataReader](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) bruker ikke implisitt resultatsett foreta utdataparametere tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, note the following: - <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> calls the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> only when <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Merk derfor følgende:- <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError>kall av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>bare når <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eksplisitt kalles.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> throws an exception, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> will wrap it in <xref:System.Data.EntityException> (or a derived exception).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>oppstår det et unntak <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError>omslutte den i <xref:System.Data.EntityException>(eller et avledet unntak).</xref:System.Data.EntityException> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close%2A> only closes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, without consuming any pending records or result sets.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close%2A>bare lukker den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>, uten bruke ventende poster eller resultatsett.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in the current row.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall kolonner i den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: Includes hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder skjulte felt.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReaderr.VisibleFieldCount%2A> to exclude hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReaderr.VisibleFieldCount%2A>skal utelates skjulte felt.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReaderr.VisibleFieldCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the current row.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner i den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den angitte kolonnen som en boolsk verdi.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a byte.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den angitte kolonnen som en byte.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column, starting at location indicated by dataIndex, into the buffer, starting at the location indicated by bufferIndex.
trans-unit.target: Leser en dataflyt byte fra den angitte kolonnen, med Start ved plasseringen angitt av dataIndex , i bufferen, som starter ved plasseringen angitt av bufferIndex .

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The index within the row from which to begin the read operation.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden leseoperasjonen starter fra.

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the data.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som å kopiere dataene.

trans-unit.source: The index with the buffer to which the data will be copied.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen med bufferen dataene skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall tegn som skal leses.

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som leses.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a single character.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den angitte kolonnen som ett tegn.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column, starting at location indicated by dataIndex, into the buffer, starting at the location indicated by bufferIndex.
trans-unit.target: Leser en dataflyt tegn fra den angitte kolonnen, med Start ved plasseringen angitt av dataIndex , i bufferen, som starter ved plasseringen angitt av bufferIndex .

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: The index within the row from which to begin the read operation.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden leseoperasjonen starter fra.

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the data.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som å kopiere dataene.

trans-unit.source: The index with the buffer to which the data will be copied.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen med bufferen dataene skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall tegn som skal leses.

trans-unit.source: The actual number of characters read.
trans-unit.target: Lese faktisk antall tegn.

trans-unit.source: Returns nested readers as <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer nestede lesere som <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal of the column.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The nested readers as <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: De nestede leserne som <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Returns a nested <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et nestet <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DbDataRecord" name="DbDataRecord" href=""></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: Antallet i <xref uid="langword_csharp_DbDataRecord" name="DbDataRecord" href=""> </xref> skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The nested data record.
trans-unit.target: Oppføringen nestede data.

trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> for den forespurte kolonneordenstall som kan overstyres med en leverandørspesifikk implementering objekter.

trans-unit.source: Gets all provider-specific attribute columns in the collection for the current row.
trans-unit.target: Henter alle leverandørspesifikk Attributtkolonner i samlingen for den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object> into which to copy the attribute columns.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Object>som skal kopieres kolonnene attributtet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
trans-unit.target: Antallet forekomster av <xref:System.Object>i matrisen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that describes the column metadata of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that describes the column metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som beskriver kolonnemetadata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as an instance of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den angitte kolonnen som en forekomst av <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en matrise av objekter med kolonneverdiene i den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> contains one or more rows.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> inneholder én eller flere rader.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> contains one or more rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> inneholder én eller flere rader; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> is closed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> er lukket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the column contains nonexistent or missing values.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kolonnen inneholder ikke-eksisterende eller manglende verdier.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneordenstall.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified column is equivalent to <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte kolonnen, tilsvarer <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the column.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Advances the reader to the next result when reading the results of a batch of statements.
trans-unit.target: Flytter leseren til neste resultat under lesing av resultatene av en bunke med uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to process multiple result sets returned when a batch is submitted to the data provider.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan du behandle flere resultatsett returneres når en bunke er sendt til dataleverandøren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more result sets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det finnes flere resultatsett; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Advances the reader to the next record in a result set.
trans-unit.target: Flytter leseren til neste post i et resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: The default position of a data reader is before the first record.
trans-unit.target: Standardplasseringen av en dataleser er før den første posten.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call `Read` to begin accessing data.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor kalle `Read` starter tilgang til data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det finnes flere rader. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall rader som er endret, settes inn eller slettes ved kjøring av SQL-setningen.

trans-unit.source: The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.
trans-unit.target: Den `RecordsAffected` egenskap ikke er satt til lese alle rader og lukker den `DataReader`.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er endret, settes inn eller slettes.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer -1 for SELECT-setninger; 0 Hvis ingen rader ble påvirket eller -setningen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of fields in the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> that are not hidden.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet felt i den <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"> </xref> som ikke er skjult.

trans-unit.source: This value is used to determine how many fields in the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader> are visible.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes til å finne ut hvor mange felt i den <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>er synlige.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader>

trans-unit.source: For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: Velg en delvis primærnøkkelen returnerer for eksempel gjenværende deler av nøkkelen som skjulte felt.

trans-unit.source: The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
trans-unit.target: Skjulte felt er alltid legges bak synlige feltene.

trans-unit.source: The number of fields that are not hidden.
trans-unit.target: Antall felt som ikke er skjult.
